pages.title: Elemental Weapons
pages.text: Elemental Weapons are powerful arms infused with primal forces. Each weapon possesses unique effects, channeling the essence of fire, air, water or earth.$(br)These weapons offer both passive abilities and special effects.$(br)Made with $(l:hexalia:items/ancient_seed)Ancient Seed$().

pages.title: Nethergrasp Scythe
pages.text: $(br)$(bold)Passive:$() Fireproof and self-repairs when near lava.$(br2)$(bold)On-hit:$() Creates a fiery cone behind struck enemies.$(br2)$(bold)Bonus:$() Striking a burning enemy grants Fire Resistance.$(br)$(#ff0000)Extinguishes the wielder if set on fire.$(br)$(#9d9d9d)Cannot be used in rain or in water.

pages.title: Aetherwing Battlestaff
pages.text: $(br)$(bold)Passive:$() Grants slow falling when held.$(br2)$(bold)Sneak + Jump:$() Sends out a wind blast, soaring upwards and knocking back enemies.$(br)$(italic)Cooldown: $(#9d9d9d)10 seconds$().$(br2)$(bold)Bonus:$() Unique combat strikes combo.

pages.title: Kelpweave Blade
pages.text: $(br)$(bold)Passive:$() Repairs when held in water.$(br2)$(bold)On-hit:$() Inflict  $(#999999)Slowness I$() effect on the target with each hit.$(br2)$(bold)Sneak:$() When in water preform a nimble dash forward.$(br)$(italic)Cooldown: $(#335b8a)5 seconds.

pages.title: Rootbound Mace
pages.text: $(br)$(bold)Passive:$() Every 4th attack stuns the target for 4 seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Sneak:$() Causes a localized eruption beneath nearby foes, launching them skyward, and inflicting Weakness.$(br)$(italic)Cooldown: $(#ae7838)8 seconds.
